text: Khueŋ guigira, kɨr Fhe Bakɨme segap ŋgu mbatɨgar ŋgɨrga tɨvi ga mbui gumgi, mbe kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Krais rimgi khanarareŋ bun nzuai kameŋ, mbe fhura ŋanŋangia nzuai kameŋ ma. Nza Fhe Bakɨme taagia nza ndigi gumgi gu mbigi, nza kaŋgi, Krais rimgi khanarareŋ bun nzuai kaman vhuueŋ, ne Fhe Bakɨmen ŋkasŋka ma.
